ing: 3 fluid ounces pineapple juice (such as DoleÂ®)
3 fluid ounces cranberry juice (such as Ocean SprayÂ®)
1 1/2 fluid ounces red apple liqueur (such as ShakkaÂ®)
1 1/2 fluid ounces lemon-lime carbonated beverage (such as 7UpÂ®)
1/2 red apple, scooped into balls with a melon baller
des: "Delicious, refreshing drink! Similar to those found at Applebee'sÂ®."
ins: Fill a large wine glass half-full with ice. Add Cabernet Sauvignon, pineapple juice, cranberry juice, red apple liqueur, lemon-lime soda, and grenadine; stir to mix. Garnish with red apple, orange, lime, and maraschino cherry.
